about_the_game:
Heavily inspired by old retro horror games, FLESH EVEREST mixes intense survival horror with slow-paced fps combat. Ammo is rare, enemies are tough, and each bullet counts. Built within a massive living organism, the Flesh Everest Nature Attraction is a one-of-a-kind facility that's open to the public and scientists alike. It seems however, that some cataclysmic event is occurring. Play as a police officer attempting to save those trapped below the flesh's surface.

Intense Gory Combat


  • Face numerous different flesh entities with varying levels of threat. Some may be docile while others are highly aggressive.
  • Some entities, while slow, are unkillable and force the player to flee.
  • Contains minimal save points with a permadeath option.
  • Physics based ragdolls and props.

Randomized Horror


  • No two playthroughs will ever be the same.
  • All weapons, ammo, and entities are fully randomized.
  • The facility is built from a mix of randomized rooms and corridors with non-random landmarks.

Scavenge for Survival


  • Over 12 different weapons to discover.
  • Each weapon has its own rarity directly related to its spawn chance.
  • Ammo is scarce and each shot counts.
  • There are 4 different ammo types with varying spawn chances.

Perk System


  • Game flow can be adjusted with perks.
  • Choose from 8 different perks, each with its own unique ability.
  • Perks can be adjusted periodically during a playthrough.

NPC Storylines


  • Encounter and speak with multiple npcs within the facility.
  • Some npcs have quests and storylines associated with them.
  • An NPC may or may not be real.

Multiple Endings and Secrets


  • Endings change based on the player's actions.
  • There are over 3 different endings to experience.
  • Numerous secrets are hidden throughout the facility.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains content such as graphic violence and other mature topics.
